title: My emails
content: My emails are no longer coming to me via Type App on Thunderbird/Mozilla. My email provider says it's not their problem, the problem is with your end. Can you help? Thanks David
creator: davidashton641

title: Thunderbird not saving open windows in session.json
content: If I have a number of tabs open in my main Thunderbird window and also a few messages open in their own windows, I just down Thunderbird cleanly, and then I restart, I get the main window with all of the tabs, but I do not get any of the open windows to reopen. I deleted my session.json in case it was corrupt. But I verified that, when I close Thunderbird, it creates a new session.json that only contains information for the main window, and not the additional windows. How do I get Thunderbird to store my ENTIRE session, including all the open windows, in session.json?
creator: rmqjones

title: Drag & Drop not working in Ver. 145 Address Book
content: The new Address Book version 145 has All Address Books, Address Book, Personal Address Book, and Collected Addresses. I created several mailing list in the Personal Address Book but I can no longer drag and drop from that book to the mailing lists. Suggestions?
creator: theoasis_1

title: I cannot change font color in Thunderbird email
content: Thunderbird no longer lets me change the font color for message composition
